From behind the whirring of air in Havotron, the four Decepticons stood
on the ground, one of them paying a lot of attention to theyre
departure. Rumble looked away from the retreating Havotron with
disapointment. He spat on the ground. "Awwww, I was hopping to fight
Soundwave. We've been inactive to long." The punk whined.

Spasstik had other things to worry about, as the wolf like robot began
growling in the opposite direction. The Constructicons were too close
for his likes, and he was ready to lunge, if he had to to protect
Soundwave, so he just began to pace, never leaving Soundwave's side, or
taking his eyes off of the green robots.

OOC:

Thank you everyone wno voted for me, and for everyone who put the effort
into running. I think this RPG is something truly speaciale, as we have
a large group of very talented players, and if we continue to just have
fun, and be friendly to each other, this game can only improve. Thank
you for the kind words Alloran, and if anyone has any ideas on new
rules, new concepts, or anything that might make this game better,
please tell the council. I don't think we were elected just so the game
is played our way, we should all compromise, so everyone is happy. Oh,
and thanks Yan, for finally seeing it as time to conclude the poll.
